thread.title: Plateno Hotels Group Ranked 7th Position in Top 325 Hotel CompaniesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Plateno Hotels Group Ranked 7th Position in Top 325 Hotel CompaniesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Plateno Hotels Group Ranked 7th Position in Top 325 Hotel CompaniesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Plateno Hotels Group Ranked 7th Position in Top 325 Hotel Companies Published on : Friday, August 7, 2015
Hotels Magazine , a magazine that provides information of the worldwide hospitality industry, in the July/August 2015 issue, released the annual hotels ranking of the world’s biggest hotel companies. The rank is gathered through the data of total hotels and room quantity. Plateno Hotels Group stands in the 7th position in the “Top 325 Hotel Companies” ranking, this is a big leap since previously was in 12th position last year.
For the “Top 10 Managed Hotels”, Plateno Hotels Group ranked in 1st position globally. For the “Top 50 Brands”, 7 Days Inn, the budget hotel from Plateno Hotels Group also ranked in 1st position with total 380,456 rooms and 2,725 hotels. These result shows that Plateno Hotels Group continues to increase both the quality and quantity of its offerings.
“The march up ranking s by Chinese hotel companies is noteworthy. Guangzhou’s Plateno Hotels Group makes a big leap up to the seventh position in the ranking.”, Quote: from Hotels Magazine.
Source:-Plateno Hotels
